resources.string: Layout Margin:-Specifies extra space on the left, top, right and bottom sides of this view.
Margin Right:-Specifies extra space on the right side of this view.
Margin Left:-Specifies extra space on the left side of this view.
Margin Top:-Specifies extra space on the top side of this view.
Margin Bottom:- Specifies extra space on the bottom side of this view.
Margin End:-Specifies extra space on the end side of this view.
Margin Horizontal :- Specifies extra space on the left and right sides of this view.
Margin Vertical :-Specifies extra space on the top and bottom sides of this view.
Margin Start :Specifies extra space on the start side of this view.
